meanings: 식사에 관한 표현 I don't have much money, so I'll get something cheap.

phrases.phrase: 메뉴를 읽을 수 없으니 가르쳐 주십시오.
meanings: 주문하기 I can't read the menu, so please tell me what it says.

phrases.phrase: 이제 시간이 없으니, 주문한 요리는 됐습니다.
meanings: 호텔에서 I don't have any more time, so cancel my order.
호텔에서 I haven't got any more time, so cancel the food I ordered.
실용회화-전화 통화중에 Call me today, no matter when.

meanings.meaning: these things are sent to try us
Everybody lies, but it doesn't matter because nobody listens.
Since we cannot get what we like, let us like what we can get.

vlive.korean: [네... 공을 구워 먹을 수 없으니] 이번에 또 골라야 하는 거예요? [Of course, you should] Should we choose? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.11
vlive.english: [Of course, you should] Should we choose?

vlive.korean: 여기에 '안 볼 수 없으니 음악 플레이할게요'를 하셨네요? It says, "We can't move on without seeing it, so let's play the music." What does this mean? 듣기 View video HA SUNG WOON : [구르미TV] EP.30 CASTLE ON A CLOUD
vlive.english: It says, "We can't move on without seeing it, so let's play the music." What does this mean?

vlive.korean: [애드리브 없으니 심심~] - 없으면 또 뭔가 비교되는 것 같기도 하고 - 그렇지 그렇지? [Sounds empty without ad-lib] - It sounds less impactful without ad-lib. - Right. 듣기 View video NCT LIFE / 심포유 - my SMTelevision : [심포유 #첸] #최초공개 #심포유OST #아름다워 #녹음비하인드
vlive.english: [Sounds empty without ad-lib] - It sounds less impactful without ad-lib. - Right.

vlive.korean: 헉쓰 넌 왜 팔이 없으니? Oh my. Why are you missing an arm? 듣기 View video 모비딕(Mobidic) : 8회 : 폐놀이공원 1편 (Closed Amusement Park)
vlive.english: Oh my. Why are you missing an arm?

vlive.korean: 그럼 시간이 없으니 바로... Since we're running out of time... 듣기 View video V PICK! : [NCT 127] 우리 마크 익스큐즈미하는 거자나요~😽 (NCT 127’s pilot show)
vlive.english: Since we're running out of time...

examples.korean: There were no children to cook for, so we could just please ourselves. 발음듣기 밥 해 줘야 할 아이들도 없으니 우린 그냥 우리 하고 싶은 대로 할 수 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: There were no children to cook for, so we could just please ourselves. 발음

examples.korean: I am not satisfied with your explanation and intend to take the matter further. 발음듣기 당신 해명으로는 만족할 수 없으니 그 문제를 더 윗사람과 얘기하겠어요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I am not satisfied with your explanation and intend to take the matter further. 발음

examples.korean: It would be an exaggeration to say I knew her well—I only met her twice. 발음듣기 내가 그녀를 잘 안다고 하면 과장일 거예요. 난 그녀를 두 번밖에 만난 적이 없으니. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It would be an exaggeration to say I knew her well—I only met her twice. 발음

examples.korean: She has every right to feel hard done by—her parents have given her nothing. 발음듣기 그녀가 충분히 억울해 할 만도 하다. 그녀의 부모가 그녀에게 아무것도 준 게 없으니. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She has every right to feel hard done by—her parents have given her nothing. 발음

examples.korean: Seeing as how you have no work experience, can we request references from your professors? 발음듣기 당신은 직장 경험이 없으니 교수들의 추천서를 요구해도 되겠습니까? DARAKWON
examples.english: Seeing as how you have no work experience, can we request references from your professors? 발음
